pages.title: DEAR RESIDENT,
pages.text: Due to an ongoing and irreversible orbital destabilization event, Earth has been officially declassified as a "habitable world."$(br2)All citizens have been evacuated via ORSA emergency transports.

pages.title: Your Evacuation Point
pages.text: Our records indicate you were not at your designated evacuation point.$(br2)Your designated evacuation point was:$(br)$(bold)EVERYWHERE.$()$(br2)We are unsure how you missed this.

pages.title: Our Attempts
pages.text: We tried the following:$(br2)$(li)Global emergency sirens$(li)14 billion text messages$(li)A really big sign$(li)Kevin from Logistics went back to look for you personally$(br2)Kevin did not find you.$(br)Kevin is very sorry.

pages.title: Current Status
pages.text: Current Earth status:$(br)  $(italic)Drifting toward deep space$()$(br2)Current Earth population:$(br)  $(italic)1$()$(br2)Current Earth vibes:$(br)  $(italic)Not great$()$(br2)Your ticket has been refunded. (There was no ticket.)

pages.title: Survival Advisory
pages.text: Go underground.$(br)Find heat.$(br)Do not look at the thermometer for a while.$(br2)If you find any ORSA documents in old structures, read them carefully. They explain how we got here.$(br2)They will not make you feel better.

pages.title: Sincerely,
pages.text: On behalf of the United Nations, the Security Council, and Kevin,$(br2)We wish you the absolute best of luck.$(br2)You will need it.$(br2)This letter will not self-destruct because we could not afford that feature.$(br2)$(italic)â€” The UN$(br)(writing this from Mars)$(br)(Mars is fine)$(br)(please don't think about that too hard)$()
